job_title: Sales Development Representative - Apptio AMS Select

• Strong leadership, presentation and collaboration skills.

• Proven time management & prioritization skills in a dynamic sales environment.
• Technical expertise in any of the following industries (CRM, AI, Analytics, Business Intelligence, Digital Marketing, Community Engagement) Desired SkillsThe ideal candidate has a background in either non-profit management and operational roles, and/or Salesforce technology.
• Provide customer feedback to the product management and engineering teams to capture new customer requirements and improvements.

• Experience or coursework involving AI‑assisted development tools for code generation, review, or efficiency.
• Knowledge of large language models (LLMs) and how they are used in modern software systems, including prompting, embedding‑based workflows, or agent‑style patterns.

• Familiarity with Model Context Protocol (MCP) concepts and/or MCP servers for integrating tools, data sources, or services with LLMs.
• Strong programming concepts with knowledge of object-oriented programming and languages like C#, Python etc.
• Strong conceptual knowledge in data structure & algorithms.
• Knowledge of software architecture concepts.
